## ReadableEthersLiquity.getBammDeposit() method

Get the current state of a Bamm Deposit.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getBammDeposit(address?: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<BammDeposit>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address that owns the Bamm Deposit. |
